name: Python Scripts
tagline: Python script tools & utilities for various usage.
body:
Python experimental area. Quick prototypes. Programming assignments & coding challenges.

## 'UEFA.com' site parsing
Script for parsing '[uefa.com](http://www.uefa.com/)' site to obtain cool web-calendars with UEFA tournament events.
Those calendars maintan two types of events:
* "whole day" event for each tournament stage with list of matches
* separate event for each match with information about participants (clubs), stadium, scores (for completed games).

Event titles contain symbols ‚öΩ & üèÜ, so you can easily identify what the event is.
Also, description of each match contains logos of playing teams.

Script: _uefa_calendar.py_ [Download](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qlogin/python/master/uefa_calendar.py)

Usage:
```python
import uefa_calendar as uefa
    
uefa.export_calendar(r'champions_league.ics', uefa.CHAMPIONS_LEAGUE)
uefa.update_score(r'europa_round6.ics', uefa.EUROPA_LEAGUE, 6, None)
```
